about_the_game:
"Choyo Girl Lirina," is a spinoff game for "LAND&HUMAN."
This is the story of Lirina, one of the main characters of "LAND@HUMAN"

"Choyo Girl Lilina" is an adventure of a 15-year-old girl who uses magic.
Use various items and magic to defeat monsters and solve the hardships of the villagers

The difficulty of the game is quite difficult and can be overcome with strategic play.

This game makes it interesting to play the journey from the

Defeat the weakest monsters of dungeon under the town of "Choroya" to level up 3 or more.

After that, enter the next dungeon, solve the problems of the Choroya villagers through sufficient levelling up, get rewarded, buy better weapons and armor in return and move to the next village.

The first task is to find Choroya Village Grandpa's wallet.

If you succeed in your first mission, you can go to the green park next to Choroya Village and receive a mission to find the young man's money. Success in that mission opens the way to the next step.

The higher the level, the higher the "HP" and "MP" levels, the stronger and more extensive magic is available.

In the early days, you can restore all your stamina at the cheapest price by using the inn in Choroya Village.

Control Is Arrow Key

Select Spacebar

Running. "shift"
detailed_description:
"Choyo Girl Lirina," is a spinoff game for "LAND&HUMAN."
This is the story of Lirina, one of the main characters of "LAND@HUMAN"

"Choyo Girl Lilina" is an adventure of a 15-year-old girl who uses magic.
Use various items and magic to defeat monsters and solve the hardships of the villagers

The difficulty of the game is quite difficult and can be overcome with strategic play.

This game makes it interesting to play the journey from the

Defeat the weakest monsters of dungeon under the town of "Choroya" to level up 3 or more.

After that, enter the next dungeon, solve the problems of the Choroya villagers through sufficient levelling up, get rewarded, buy better weapons and armor in return and move to the next village.

The first task is to find Choroya Village Grandpa's wallet.

If you succeed in your first mission, you can go to the green park next to Choroya Village and receive a mission to find the young man's money. Success in that mission opens the way to the next step.

The higher the level, the higher the "HP" and "MP" levels, the stronger and more extensive magic is available.

In the early days, you can restore all your stamina at the cheapest price by using the inn in Choroya Village.

Control Is Arrow Key

Select Spacebar

Running. "shift"
name: 초요소녀 리리나(Choyo Girl Lilina)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS10
  • Processor: INTEL PENTIUM
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated motherboard sound
  • VR Support:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS10
  • Processor: INTEL PENTIUM
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated motherboard sound
  • VR Support:
